projects.title: Youth Times
projects.description: Youth Times is a student-led online newspaper platform that empowers young writers to share campus stories, opinions, and news. Built with Flask, HTML/CSS, and flexible database support.

projects.title: Spotify Live Banner
projects.description: A real-time, customizable Python/Flask web service that displays the current Spotify song you are listening to as a banner image, perfect for GitHub profile READMEs.

projects.title: Spotify Refresh Token Generator
projects.description: A simple, self-hostable Flask app to get Spotify Refresh Tokens for your website, bot, or other projects. Handles the auth flow for you.
